jd: Hello Vendors ,I hope this email finds you well.We are currently seeking a .NET Developer for an exciting opportunity in Montvale, NJ . Please review the job details below and let us know if you are interested.Job Title: .NET full Stack DeveloperLocation: Montvale, NJ - This is a hybrid role with work on site 2 days a week at their Montvale office.Looking local to NJ only Visa-USC, GC, GC EAD, L2 EAD,H4 EAD- No H1BLocal candidates required within 60 miles final round will be in-personRequired Skills/Experience: Angular 14 & 15 .NET Core (6.0 or above)SQL experience with respect to app development, Entity Framework or Dapper experienceExperience in Azure Cloud; having any certification (or just AZ-900) is a plus.Experience working in Agile based development.Experience in Git branching/code commit process.Financial Experience is a plus.
